review: We have visited Dr Sandhya Vasan for our first pregnancy. She is very kind, calm *** **** **** ******* She is very supportive and explained everything about what to do, what to eat. Thank you ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very pleasant. Her calm approach to diagnose the issue.her patience in listening to the problem calmly

Gynecology department- Dr Sandhya Vasan was a blessing to me during my pregnancy. She was friendly , kind and highly knowledgeable. She explained all important things to manage pregnancy easily and clarified all my doubts patiently. I went through c-section but she was the best person to have in the theater to guide you through the fear and all the new moments with the baby. I walked out of Sims hospital in 2 days feeling totally normal solely because of her.

Thank you so much Mam

Visited doctor Sandhya for ovarian cyst problem. Doctor is very friendly and explained all the medical terms clearly. She listened patiently and answered all my questions and doubts. Highly recommend!
**** **** ******* She listens to the patient and checks the details very well . She has ensured that we are very comfortable
